title: Aldo's steak tartare
ingredients: ['500g minced beef', '1 tablespoon chopped parsley', '1 tablespoon capers', '1 tablespoon chopped red onion', '4 teaspoons lemon juice', '1 tablespoon mustard', '4 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', 'To serve', '4 egg yolks', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '1 tablespoon capers', 'lemon slices', '1 tablespoon chopped red onion', '1 tablespoon chopped parsley', '1 tablespoon mustard seeds']
